r and other childhood kidney tumors include a lump in the abdomen and blood in the urine.    - Tests that examine the kidney and the blood are used to detect (find) and diagnose Wilms tumor and other childhood kidney tumors.    - Certain factors affect prognosis (chance of recovery) and treatment options.
                
                
                    Childhood kidney tumors are diseases in which malignant (cancer) cells form in the tissues of the kidney.
